question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take off and fly upwards same to the building height and take a turn and fly straight to the opposite building after reaching the building turn left. after turning left fly between the gap of the building and fly downwards to the lake and fly upwards from the lake and turn left and fly straight towards the building at the opposite and fly near to the entrance of the park. fly upwards and take a turn and start flying straight to the building at the opposite crossover the lake after reaching the building fly near the eds butcher shop and fly upwards and again take a turn. after taking a turn fly straight towards the tall building in the opposite fly at the same height of the building. after reaching the tall building turn right to the opposite of the building and start flying downwards continuously towards the lake fly downwards at the center of the lake.]. You move according to a series of movement instructions. When you reach current location, what is the Landmark Position to Eds Butcher Shop?
choose:
A. I am located to the left of the Eds Butcher Shop.
B. I am located above the Eds Butcher Shop.
C. I am located underneath the Eds Butcher Shop.
D. I am located to the right of the Eds Butcher Shop.
E. I am located behind Eds Butcher Shop.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location is above the Eds Butcher Shop as per the navigation instructions which indicate flying near and then upwards from specific landmarks, suggesting an aerial perspective.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(512, 516), (517, 520)]
Option: B
Reason: The video shows that the current location is above the Eds Butcher Shop. The navigation instructions indicate flying near and then upwards from specific landmarks, suggesting an aerial perspective.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: B; Reason: The current location is above the Eds Butcher Shop as per the navigation instructions which indicate flying near and then upwards from specific landmarks, suggesting an aerial perspective.
